description: Hello World Lambda function with Python 3.13 and ARM64

repository.short_description: Simple Hello World Lambda function with AWS PowerTools integration
repository.about: A demonstration Lambda function that showcases Python 3.13 runtime, ARM64 architecture, and AWS PowerTools for logging, tracing, and metrics. Perfect for testing containerized Lambda deployments.
repository.usage: Deploy to AWS Lambda using the container image. Send JSON payload with optional 'Name' field in Parameters. Example: {'Details': {'Parameters': {'Name': 'Alice'}}} returns personalized greeting.

changes: Changed response format to use kebab-case keys (status-code)
Updated to use PascalCase for Amazon Connect input parameters (Name)
Simplified response structure following standard pattern
Extract Name from Details.Parameters instead of event root
